title: 10th convocation ceremony of St. Philomena’s College held in Mysuru
description: 611 candidates complete various courses

title: Jagan Mohan Reddy will be left alone in YSRCP soon, says Ganta Srinivasa Rao
description: Many YSRCP leaders including Rajya Sabha MPs, former MLAs, MLCs are eager to join the NDA, says the TDP MLA

title: ‌Will Pucovski compelled to early retirement following repetitive concussions
description: One-Test Australian prodigy Will Pucovski is set to call time on his cricket career after incurring repetitive blows on the head in his young career. He has been suffering from symptoms of concussion throughout his short-lived career and has decided to hang up his boots for a change in profession.

title: DVAC arrests VAO on graft charge
description: DVAC arrests VAO on graft charge

title: Madras week | Life in the day of a fisherman
description: Ashok, a fisherman from Urur Olcott Kuppam in Besant Nagar, shares how deeply he feels committed to fishing as a profession despite the challenges, besides recalling the mid-sea ordeal after being caught in a tornado five years back and says even a tsunami could not separate him from Chennai

title: 5,500 people suffering from eye-related problems in Kuppam, says Collector
description: The medical camps and screening tests will continue in Kuppam region till September 4, he added

title: Give adequate publicity to voter verification drive, CfD urges Chief Electoral Officer
description: The forum also suggested that the Election Commission of India hold a meeting with all political parties and appoint booth-level agents to accompany the booth-level officers in house visits while conducting the voter verification programme

title: With Rs 1.48 lakh crore bids, Premier Energies IPO achieves this feat!
